content.query:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---Insert new records
INSERT INTO Sales.dimCustomers
SELECT *
FROM Sales.ExCustomers as stg
WHERE NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT *
    FROM Sales.dimCustomers AS dim WHERE dim.Customer_Name = stg.Customer_Name
)


---SCD Type 1
UPDATE Sales.dimCustomers
SET Phone = stg.Phone ,
    Address_Line1 = stg.Address_Line1,
    Address_Line2 = stg.Address_Line2,
    City =  stg.City, 
    State =  stg.State, 
    Postal_Code =  stg.Postal_Code,
    Country =  stg.Country, 
    Territory =  stg.Territory, 
    Contact_Lastname =  stg.Contact_Lastname,
    Conact_Firstname =  stg.Conact_Firstname
FROM Sales.dimCustomers AS dim INNER JOIN Sales.ExCustomers AS stg
ON dim.Customer_Name = stg.Customer_Name
WHERE dim.Phone <> stg.Phone 
OR dim.Address_Line1 <> stg.Address_Line1 
OR dim.Address_Line2 <> stg.Address_Line2
OR dim.City <> stg.City 
OR dim.State <> stg.State 
OR dim.Postal_Code <> stg.Postal_Code
OR dim.Country <> stg.Country 
OR dim.Territory <> stg.Territory 
OR dim.Contact_Lastname <> stg.Contact_Lastname
OR dim.Conact_Firstname <> stg.Conact_Firstname

ALTER INDEX ALL ON  Sales.dimCustomers REBUILD

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSERT INTO Sales.dimOrderDate
SELECT *
FROM Sales.ExOrderDate AS stg
WHERE NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT *
    FROM Sales.dimOrderDate AS dim WHERE dim.Order_Number = stg.Order_Number 
)

---SCD Type 1
UPDATE Sales.dimOrderDate
SET Order_Date = stg.Order_Date,
    Status = stg.Status 
FROM Sales.dimOrderDate AS dim INNER JOIN Sales.ExOrderDate AS stg ON dim.Order_Number = stg.Order_Number 
WHERE dim.Order_Date <> stg.Order_Date OR dim.Status <> stg.Status 

ALTER INDEX ALL ON Sales.dimOrderDate REBUILD

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



INSERT INTO Sales.dimProducts
SELECT *
FROM Sales.ExProducts AS stg
WHERE NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT *
    FROM Sales.dimProducts AS dim WHERE dim.Product_Code = stg.Product_Code
)

---SCD Type 1
UPDATE Sales.dimProducts
SET MSRP = stg.MSRP,
    Product_Line = stg.Product_Line
FROM Sales.dimProducts AS dim INNER JOIN Sales.ExProducts AS  stg ON dim.Product_Code = stg.Product_Code
WHERE dim.MSRP <> stg.MSRP OR dim.Product_Line <> stg.Product_Line

ALTER INDEX ALL ON Sales.dimProducts REBUILD

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


INSERT INTO Sales.dimSalesDeals
SELECT *
FROM Sales.ExSalesDeals AS stg
WHERE NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT *
    FROM Sales.dimSalesDeals AS dim WHERE dim.Sales = stg.Sales
)

---SCD Type 1
UPDATE Sales.dimSalesDeals
SET Deal_Size = stg.Deal_Size
FROM Sales.dimSalesDeals AS dim INNER JOIN Sales.ExSalesDeals AS stg ON dim.Sales = stg.Sales
WHERE dim.Deal_Size <> stg.Deal_Size 

ALTER INDEX ALL ON Sales.dimSalesDeals REBUILD
